attributes.action: Get david cameron OUT of NO.10
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron and the conservatives are liars and a cheats to the UK economy, he has threw away millions of peoples hard earned tax money to foreign aid, keeping illegal imagrants in our jails and funding his own pesonal gains. The economy is not recovering, the people are still suffering and they do not care to even acknowledge this they bang on about the EU like its the key to heaven and we all know it is just a 55 million a day money pit, which they pay into to secure a job at the end of their term in parliament, if there are enough signatures we will be heard the people have a voice let it be heard through this petition

rejection.details: This is a party political matter
